body: Guess i'll just stick to this one
Since I'm not a NTR fan,I'll avoid the rest of this series.

So i took a look in the raw thing and my dude, what we have here, LMAO.
so the dude didn't just get NTR'ED once but every woman he meet's and sleep with and even his first girl friend get's fucked in front of him,
with no apparent reason. if u like ntr that's a catch for you. sadly i like the art but not the ntr,
I always thought about myself as a seasoned veteran in all things Pervy... until I saw the comments here. Some true die-hard, hard-boiled veterans. I tip my hat to you, a filthy weeb to another.

It's this story?! This shit is so fuckin weird. Like Hoshino had to jump through hoops to make this shit connect, this story has an ntr snowball effect and it's hilariously stupid. I think the funniest thing is gonna be the chapter when the gf pulls up cuz that shit is absolutely wild.

Hoshino Ryuichi's NTR works are pretty much all similar in structure if you read enough of this artist's stuff (Hoshino has been around for a long time and well-known, the artstyle is still from the mangas of a decade ago or two). Take for example his previous series, the hypnosis series with that fuckface (lol I hated that dickhead's face with passion, idk why but I do :P ) and how it ended. This one is no different but at least it is like what everyone else is saying "relatively happy ending", depending on how you look at it. OK here is the raw: https://nhentai.net/g/157239/

@The Real America Yeah there's NTR. Relatively mild all things considered because the fucker who steals his girls gets his comeuppdance, so the ending is relatively ok I suppose. At least it's better than most NTR stories where the main character gets cucked forever. You can just search for the raws and get a gist of the story.
Holy shit she made me scream internally. I hope there's a continuation.

This is why black haired waifus are the besssttttt.....she's sooo BEAUTIFUL!!!! 😍😍😍😍 That handjob grip on pg 8 looks like a clamp, I'll nut gallons if I get squeezed like that ❤❤❤❤🌰🌰🌰🌰🌰🌰. Love her big titty fuck and blowjob. That'll make me melt 😭😭😭😭

Although I suppose this author IS known for NTR.....
@AnonMan88 Wait wait wait, this turns into an NTR? It looks like anything but NTR from this first chapter.

Fyi, this train wreck is a roller coaster with BOTH harem and NTR (of EVERY harem member at least once).

It does have a... happy(?) ending, but we don't get to see him claim them back, as the story ends rather abruptly.  The MC doesn't even have sex at all in the final chapter.
